feed.title: Hemmelig Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Hemmelig: v6.7.0 - The Tip Tap Editor
entry.content:
The new editor: https://tiptap.dev/docs

What's Changed

  • Minor fixes in the French translation by @2franix in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/397
  • feat: replace quill with the tiptap editor by @bjarneo in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/400

48bacf8 - fix: remove the rm rf <@bjarneo> 50b6cdf - fix: add burger menu for mobile <@bjarneo> 2986b78 - fix: remove the rm rf <@bjarneo> 2b93a16 - chore: update the copy icons <@bjarneo>

Full Changelog: https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/compare/v6.6.1...v6.7.0

Full Changelog: https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/compare/v6.7.0...v6.7.1

675d287 - fix: header width and menu location <@bjarneo> e297c1a - fix: not allowed for ttl and files <@bjarneo>

entry.title: New release for Hemmelig: v6.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps): bump esbuild, @fastify/vite, @vitejs/plugin-react and vite by @dependabot in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/412
  • chore(deps): bump react-router and react-router-dom by @dependabot in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/413
  • chore(deps): bump @babel/runtime from 7.26.0 to 7.27.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/407
  • Update translation.json by @Man-in-Black in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/416

New Contributors

  • @Man-in-Black made their first contribution in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/416

Full Changelog: https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/compare/v6.7.1...v6.7.2
